name: Shellbrook FS22
description:
Saskatchewan is here again, and for the first time in FS22. The map is inspired from Shellbrook and based on DEM map.

The map is anhydrous ready, western canada wheather and equiped with several industries to explore FS22 new features. Hotspots were conserved to keep the map userfriendly.

Two grain farms and one dairy. Two sell points, one in town the second one in a private farm.

You start the game owning the main farm and two fields. No machinery but your grand'pa has given you a valuable gift. If you sell it you should be able to buy some equipment to start your career.

Some credits to Elk Mountain Modding , TPF, Crooked Creek Modding for the mods used and Forward Agricultural team for testing.

Pictures show:

Farm 01

Farm 02

Dairy

Sell points in town

Grain sell point and more on farm

Livestock

Please keep the download link in the group page. Have a good game.

Camil
